interface.name: org.alljoyn.BulkDataTransfer.FirmwareUpdate
interface.description: This interface provides to means to create a bus object that contains firmware update images.

method.name: OpenUpdate
method.description: Creates a bus object containing a firmware update image.

method.name: CloseUpdate
method.description: Closes a bus object containing a firmware update image.

signal.name: UpdateAvailable
signal.description: Informs device of an available update.
